paidDaysLeft.endOfYear: Vacation days left until the end of year

vacation.created:
Your vacation request is saved but not sent for confirmation. 
If your request doesn’t need any changes then please click 'Send to confirmation'
vacation.sent:
Your vacation request for dates {{vacation.startDate}} - {{vacation.endDate}} was sent for confirmation to your manager {{manager.firstName}} {{manager.lastName}}.
NB Have you notified your project manager(s) about your vacation request dates?
vacation.confirmed:
The vacation request of user {{owner.firstName}} {{owner.lastName}} is now confirmed and visible from the vacations’ overview page. 
NB Are the project managers aware of the vacation?
vacation.updated: A Vacation is updated with identifier {{ param }}
vacation.deleted: A Vacation is deleted with identifier {{ param }}
vacation.rejected: The vacation request of user {{owner.firstName}} {{owner.lastName}} was rejected.

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Vacation {{ id }}?

cancel.question: Are you sure you want to cancel Vacation {{ id }}?

dialog.sickLeaveTooltip: When going on a sick leave, You are generally taking off undetermined amount of days. You can enter end date (e.g end your sick leave) after sending the request to confirmation
